events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking hasn't updated for days, and I am very concerned about the delay.
The reported issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of late shipping and tracking issues.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in delivery problems to assist the customer promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. Let's see what we can do to get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so that I can investigate the shipment status for you?
Sure, my order number is 789654123, and the tracking number on the website is 1234TRACK5678. The last update was five days ago.

Thank you for that information. I've contacted the shipping provider, and it appears there was an unexpected delay. We can offer a 10% refund or resend the item immediately. Which option would you prefer?
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. I would prefer to receive the item as soon as possible, so please resend it.
We have arranged for your order to be resent with priority shipping. You will receive new tracking details shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just following up to confirm that your replacement order has arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for working with us to resolve your delivery delay.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
